1413.content: How about another character from the Pokemon Universe?
1413.title: more choices

14131.content:
The battle raged between Pikachu, and the team belonging to the famed, Pokemon Trainer. Sparks were flying, clashing against blasts of water, fire, and leaves. Pikachu struggled, but all hope seemed lost. There was no way Pikachu could possibly take on the forces of three, specially trained by a human for battle.

Ivysaur's vine whip came rushing toward the electric pest, and suddenly, a crate fell from the sky, clashing with the vines, and cracking open, dropping a pokeball on the ground right in front of Pikachu. "Yes!" he thought to himself. It could only be fate that another pokemon would come fry the sky to help even the odds. Pikachu grabbed it, and threw it directly at Ivysaur.

Manaphy flies into the sky, spinning and firing red beams from it's antennae. One struck Pikachu in the head, and he froze. The other aimed for Ivysaur, who leaped out of the way. The beam swerved backwards, and hit the Pokemon Trainer in charge of the action instead.

Pikachu shook his head, and opened his eyes, breaking the trance. He braced himself for an incoming attack as he stared at Ivysaur in front of him. Nothing came at him. Instead, Ivysaur seemed to be concerned if he was hurt. "I'm fine, don't worry." said Pikachu.

"What!?!" he blerted out. "Since when can I speak human?" Pikachu looked down. His fur was gone! He was wearing a human's <i>clothes</i>! His paws were now full fledged hands with fingers, thumbs, skin: The Whole Package. He was now a human, in charge of other pokemon. He was the Pokemon Trainer!


The real Pokemon Trainer woke up on the battlefield. His eyes were drawn to Ivysaur, who seemed confused. The trainer figured it was best to give Ivysaur a rest and send out Charizard to clean up. He reached for his belt...

"Pika Pika! Pi? Pika? PIKA?" The trainer was in total shock. Where were his pokeballs? Where were his fingers? Where was his voice? When he tried to change pokemon, he touched nothing but soft yellow fur with paws where his hands were. He couldn't even cry out for help. He just kept squeaking that name.


"<B>TIME UP</B>" shouts the announcer's voice.

Pikachu and the Pokemon Trainer were warped back to the other's room.
14131.title: Pikachu against the odds

141312.content: When Pikachu went back to his room he thought "oh my god a human body..." Then he heard a knock. It was Pokemon trainer (in pikachu's body.) Then Pikachu got an idea... a __________ idea.

151311.content:
Roy isn't in Brawl, but that doesn't mean I can't have him be in it for this story. In this storyline, Lyn isn't Roy's mother, even though she has the possibility to be in the Fire Emblem series. A Character's gender will be considered whatever gender that the body they're in is.

At the stage 'Castle Siege'

Roy was fighting Marth in a timed match. Roy had made it back in even though he wasn't supposed to. The two swordsmen kept striking with their blades, but the other one would block. Suddenly a Poke Ball and an Assist Trophy appeared on the field. Marth went to get the Poke Ball, while Roy went to get the Assist Trophy.

"You won't defeat me!" Marth shouted as he ran to the Poke Ball.

"I wouldn't be so sure about that!" Roy replied as he reached the Assist Trophy.

Roy grabbed and used the Assist Trophy, quickly followed by Marth with the Poke Ball. Lyn appeared from the Trophy and crouched down, then vanished and struck Marth, who went flying out of the stage right as Manaphy came out of the Poke Ball and used Heart Swap. Since Marth hadn't been brought back yet, Manaphy's Heart Swap hit Roy and Lyn, who hadn't disappeared yet. The two fell down, with Lyn’s body not disappearing. Marth was brought back to the field.

“Sorry Roy, but I’m not going to stop just because you’re down.” Marth said as he charged at Roy’s body with his sword out. Marth was about to strike when time ran out and all three Fire Emblem characters were teleported out of the field.

<B>"This game's winner is Roy!"</B> The announcer declared. Lyn and Roy's bodies were brought to their rooms.

<B>Later, in Lyn's room.</B>

Roy woke up and groaned, but didn't notice the change in her voice at first. As she stood up however, she felt something jiggling on her chest. Roy looked down and saw her new breast, but that wasn't all, she recognized the clothing she was wearing as Lyn's!

"What the heck is going on?" Roy wondered in surprise, and immediately noticed that it was Lyn's voice that came out. Roy found a full body mirror and looked at it, she saw Lyn looking back. "Yep, I'm in Lyn's body alright." Suddenly Roy saw a note on a table near her new bed. She went to check it out and saw that it was a note saying that Lyn had gone from being an Assist Trophy to being an actual character in Brawl.

Roy went back to the mirror and moved her new arm around in front of her and watched in fasination as her reflection did the same thing. Roy then got a perverted grin on her new face as she squeezed her new breasts and moaned. Roy always tried to be polite and respect others, but she still had the mind of a teenage boy and was in a beautiful girl's body. Roy heard a knock on the door and then her old voice.

What did Roy's original body say?
151311.title: Elibe Switch

choices: Says "I'm sorry, I love you so much that I couldn't help myself."
knocks Lyn in her body down and thinks of something fun to do
1513111.content:
"Roy did you hear me?" Lyn asks as he enters the room, because it isn't locked, and he sees Roy touching herself infront of the mirror "What the f~ are you doing! That's my body!" Roy doesn't know how to anwser, and looks like a little child that is caught when doing something they were told not to do.

"I... I..." Roy can't anwser.

"Stop touching my chest you pervert!" Lyn shouts as Roy lowers her hands "Is that what you take me for? A pair of flesh? I thought you were nice!"

"I'm sorry for real, I didn't really know what I was doing, it was just like instinct" Roy replies.

"Instinct! instinct! You are such a jerk! I can't believe you are such a pervert!" He shouts angrilly. Suddenly Marth enters the room.

"There you are, great battle my friend, you have become better since last time." Marth says.

"It was nothing." Roy anwsers in Lyn body and voice.

Marth looks at her with a surprised face says "What the... oh yeah, you slashed me really hard at the last second Lyn, great job, come out for a minute Roy, I want to talk with you." Lyn was spaced out until Roy gave him a small shove, he then went out. "Man, you have grow stronger, later there's going to be a Team Battle, you will be my partner right?" Marth asks.

"Y..yes I will!" Lyn replies, still a little spaced out.

"I'll understand I you want to go with her though, since she is now a brawl character." Marth says.

"Whose the new player?" Lyn asks.

"Don't you know? It's Lyn!! I think you are kinda lost, I'll ask Link for the Team Battle, you'd better focus on the battle." Marth says as he walks away
As Marth leaves, Roy hurries to where her old body is at, still facing the corridor Marth went down.

"So what did he talk to you about? About the team battle?... Why are you blushing?" Roy asks.

"N.. nothing." Lyn replies.

"I think you might like this exchange a little, don't you?" Roy asks.

Regaining confidence, as he already knows what Roy was touching while she was alone, he says "Nevermind pervert, let's go back to my room, or someone will notice us." They went in.

Back in the room Roy....

15211.content:
I couldn't find any info on Samus's personality, so she'll be pretty easy to use since whoever writes can make it up. A Character's gender will be considered whatever gender that the body they're in is.

At the stage 'Battlefield'

Ike was battling Samus, who was charging up her Charge Shot. A Poke Ball appeared on the field and Ike grabbed it, just as a Smash Ball appeared near Samus.

"No!" Ike shouted as he ran towards it as Samus broke the barrier around it with her fully charged up attack, then ran towards it.

"It's mine!" Samus shouted. Ike threw the Poke Ball at Samus, and it hit her, allowing Ike to make some progress, before the Poke Ball could open up to release the Pokemon inside, both characters grabbed the Smash Ball and started glowing. Samus used the Zero Laser and Ike used Great Aether. As the two attacks collided, Manaphy came out of the Poke Ball and used Heart Swap.

"What the-" Was all Ike and Samus had time to say as Heart Swap hit them right as their Final Smashes began. Samus's Armor fell off right as Ike's spirit entered her body. Both bodies were transported off the stage and brought into their rooms.

In Samus's room the next morning.

Ike groaned as she woke up. It was early and she didn't notice the change in her voice. She got up and and stumbled as she stood up because her center of balance was off. She also felt something odd on her chest as whatever it was bounced a little. She looked down and saw her new breasts.

"What the-" Ike began but stopped when she heard her new voice. "I recognize that voice! It's Samus's!" She still wasn't used to hearing her new voice coming from her mouth. She ran to the mirror and looked in. She saw Samus staring back. Ike touched her cheek and the reflection of Samus did the same. Ike gave a perverted grin. Even though Ike was a kind person who usually tried to be respectful to others, she was still a teenage boy mentally, and she was in Samus's body, you do the math. Ike grabbed her new breasts and squeezed them as she moaned in delight. She heard someone knocking on the door, then heard her old voice.

What did Ike's original body say?
15211.title: Ike and Samus/Zero Suit Samus

152111.content:
Samus opened the door.

"What the hell are doing in my body!?" She shouted angrily.

"I'm sorry, I couldn't help it, I'm still a guy!" Ike replied, he felt really weird now.

"We should find out what did this to us, now!" Samus said.

"I kinda like it and I've wanted try a new fighting style, what do you say Samus? " Ike suggested.

1521112.content:
"Like hell I'll agree you playful guy, you were just squeezing my chest a second ago!" Samus said in anger.

"I'm really sorry, I'll prove to you that I can really be like you out of the battle, but please let me try your fast movement speed. While I'm myself, it's like all might and no real speed, could you do it please?" Ike asks.

"Mmm... I don't really have a powerful smash attack, even while wearing my suit, and now I can hold this broadsword like a piece of cake." Samus was saying.

"You see, I knew you would understand!" Ike interrupted.

"Just one condition!! We will be near each other outside battles so you don't start doing your funny things, because I can't stand it, ok?" He replied

A loud voice was heard "Ike has been selected for combat."

"Of course." Ike replied.

"Ok. Don't do anything funny while I'm fighting" Samus said while he was leaving to the battle.

So what will Ike do?

Sonic's POV

154131.title: Pikachu

1541321.content:
A small boy with a baseball cap raced through the halls. He and his good friend had been planning something for several days, but he needed someone else to make it possible. Where was she... where was she...?

There! The swish of her pink dress! The boy ran down the hall and around the corner, and almost ran face first into Princess Peach.

"Oh! Ness. Can I help you?" The princess asked politely.

"Um, yeah. Sonic wanted to see you. He said it's urgent."

"Oh? I wonder what it could be..." She said, lifting up her skirt and walking briskly ("Princess's never run" Toadsworth always told her) to Sonic's room.

Meanwhile, Sonic was in his room, resting. He had just gotten back from a Sudden Death match with Captain Falcon. Not even his speed can save him from a Falcon Punch...

He heard a light knock on his door. "Hm? Come in!"

The door opened, and in walked the blonde princess of the Mushroom Kingdom. She smiled sweetly at him.

"Oh, hello your highness." Sonic said respectfully. The heir to the throne giggled with a gloved hand in front of her mouth.

"Sonic, I told you. Call me Peach."

Sonic chuckled as Peach took a seat, crossing her legs in a perfectly ladylike manner.

"You wanted to see me about something?"

Sonic perked up. "No. I was hoping to get some rest."

Peach cocked her head slightly. "You were? But Ness said..."

Two boys, Ness and one significantly older, peeked into Sonic's room.

"Alright, Pokemon Trainer, NOW!" Ness said.

The nameless Pokemon Trainer opened the door and flung the Pokeball he'd obtained from the area that they kept the items, and that he had been saving in before either occupants could react.

"Go, Manaphy! Heart Swap!"

The bright blue Pokemon cried out happily and extended it's two antenna. One plucked the polite, demure heart of the princess, while the other extracted the more confident, free spirited heart of the Hedgehog, before spinning around and placing them in the opposite bodies. Immediately, both both victims fainted.

Ness jumped into the air. "Yes! It worked!"

"We'd better get out of her before they wake up." Advised the Pokemon Trainer as Manaphy vanished. Ness nodded, and the two set off.
1541321.title: Sonic and Peach switch

15413211.content:
Peach woke up feeling something different about her.

"That's odd, I don't feel like a princess, I think I should look at the mirror." She said, then she looked at the mirror, "Blue spiked fur, green eyes, red shoes. I'm Sonic!!!" Peach yelled, then Peach's body woke up.

"Ow...my head, what happend?" Peach's body asked.

"Sonic? Is that you?" Peach asked

"Yeah. Peach? What happend?" Sonic asked.

"We both swapped bodies, no thanks with Ness and Pokemon Trainer." Peach said, then there is a knock on the door and...

15531121.content:
Toon Link and Samus were fighting. Toon Link was never really proud of hitting a girl, and Samus was never proud of hitting a kid, but that was what the game was about. Samus grabbed a Poke Ball and threw it towards Toon Link.

"Ha! I've got help now!" She laughed. But then Manaphy appeared out the ball. A bright flash came bursting out and they were both at their homes in bed.

Samus was the first to wake up. He got out bed and felt something was terribly wrong. He dashed to the nearest mirror and saw... Toon Link. "Oh... oh my god... oh... no..." He thought. He touched his nose. Then the Toon Link in the reflection did and at that moment he freaked out. "OH MY GOD! I'M TOON LINK!!!!!!!!!!!!! I'M A 10 YEAR OLD MIDGET BOY!!!! NOOOO!!!"

Toon Link woke up, then got out bed. She felt tall and was confused about it. She looked in a mirror, and saw Samus looking back.

'No way.' She thought. She lifted her arm up and at the same time, the reflection of Samus did. "Aw crap." She said. She was about to dash off to find Samus, when she noticed something. "Wait... I've got a girl's body." She smiled, then thought 'I could have some fun here... wait! This is wrong! I'm 10, and she's... well, I don't actually know how old she is, but way older than me! What should I do?'
15531121.title: What to do?

info.brief_description: Based on the news that Manaphy is in Brawl as a Poke Ball Pokemon. More info inside.
info.description:
An accident with Heart Swap in a match either makes it so two to four playable characters permanently switch bodies with each other or assist trophies, or that one of the characters ends up in multiple bodies.

Rules:

Ok, at the start, no character can be in love with someone of their gender, but if that person gets in the body of someone of the other gender, then romance is ok (an example is that Mario and Link can't be in love, but if one of them gets a female body, then it is ok).

No incest, even if one character gets in an unrelated body (an example is that Luigi can't get with Mario even if one of them got Peach's body)

Any pairing that doesn't conflict with what I've said is ok.

Use proper grammar and spelling.

If I find out that someone who adds has stolen someone else's chapter, and then posted it as their own, then I'll delete it.

Poke Ball Pokemon can not take part in the switch.

Stick to the story that's going on, don't switch it all the sudden without any explanation.

Certain costume changes can be counted as different characters, and it doesn't matter if the characters that switch are in Brawl or not; all playable Smash Bros Characters are allowed, but some of the costume changes and Assist Trophies aren't.

The Melee Version of Link is counted as a separate character from the Brawl one since they are based on different Links, same goes for the Zeldas/Sheiks.

Costume change characters and Assist Trophies that are allowed: Daisy, Dark Link, Fusion Samus, Knuckle Joe, Andross, Lyn, Mr. Resetti, Saki Amamiya, Shadow the Hedgehog, and Dark Meta Knight.

Certain other characters will be allowed in for this story and be considered 'playable characters'. If you want someone else in, just send me a message telling me which character, and what game they're from, but I won't put all of them in. Here are the extra characters so far:
Tetra/Toon Zelda (Legend of Zelda series)
Baby Mario and Baby Luigi (Team, Mario series)
Krystal (Starfox series)
Dixie Kong (Donkey Kong series)
Blaze the Cat (Sonic series)
Puppet Zelda (Legend of Zelda series)
Shadow Queen (Mario series)
Miles "Tails" Prowler (Sonic series)
Ty the Tasmanian Tiger (his own series)
The following are all from the Fire Emblem series:
Micaiah
Sothe
Lethe
Ephraim
Eirika
Nino

I'm also adding more characters as Assist Trophies, and each of them are allowed to switch:
Knuckles (Sonic series)
Vivian (Mario series)
The next following are all from the Fire Emblem series:
Mist
L'Arachel
Myrrh

There are certain characters to who can't switch with each other, here they are:
Melee Link, Young Link, Brawl Link, and Toon Link
Melee Zelda/Sheik, Brawl Zelda/Sheik, Puppet Zelda, and Tetra/Toon Zelda
Fusion Samus and Samus
Shadow Queen and Peach
Mario, Doctor Mario, Luigi, Baby Mario, and Baby Luigi
Pikachu and Pichu
Male and Female Ice Climbers
Rob with anyone

A playable character can be in more than one body because of the mistake, but an Assist Trophy character can't.

The characters will all be living in a mansion. The characters start out in the mansion, but you can make them go on an adventure anytime you want.

Other than what I said, you can do just about anything, but I will step in at times if I think someone has gone too far or ends the story.

I'm going to give 300 Gift Points to anyone who makes a real chapter without breaking any of my rules.
